snippet: It was not the Bolshoi Theater that announced the cancellation of Wayne McGregor's new ballet, but Emerging Pictures, the United States distributor for the films of the Bolshoi Ballet and Opera.
abstract: It was not the Bolshoi Theater that announced the cancellation of Wayne McGregor's new ballet, but Emerging Pictures, the United States distributor for the films of the Bolshoi Ballet and Opera.

headline.main: Bolshoi Ballet Postpones 'Rite of Spring' Premiere
headline.print_headline: Bolshoi Ballet Postpones ‘Rite of Spring’ Premiere
